name: Tower Defense (JiaGuan)
description:
Control:

Pause, Restart, Menu:  Esc or p

Move Camera: A, W, S, D

Zoom In: Scroll Mouse

Build Turret: Click on the turret you want to build and click the white square you want to build on

Upgrade Turret, Sell Turret: Click on the turret 

Difficulty:

  • You have to pass the easy to unlock the hard

Music:

  • Calm Space Music
  • Hover Sound Effect
  • Click Sound Effect

Goal: 

Try to beat both levels!
